Articles.Content:
So been having a little issue with a new install of Interstellar. When I launch the game it will mostly hang or now and then crash (its only using 2gig at that point).

Unless I delete the module manager cache file, in which case it starts fine and works fine. 

Mods

Spoiler

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26687/output_log%20hang.txt

 

Any ideas what is causing it? or why deleting the cache file always lets it work fine.

Thanks

So I've done a fresh install of the base game and then the mods and running into the same issue again.

Really not sure what to try now. Its not a major issue, but its a little annoying having to remember to delete the cache file every time.

Seems that deleting the cache file doesn't always work, I have to start the game a few times before it will finally load. 

Crash log https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26687/output_log%20crash.txt

Does anyone have an idea from the logs? Not sure what to look for in them. Thanks
